name: @leanup/stack-angular
description: This package contains the Angular framework extension for the @leanup/cli.
author: Martin Oppitz <npmjs@martinoppitz.com>

scripts.build:cjs: tsc --outDir dist/cjs -p tsconfig.cjs.json && node ../../../../scripts/package.js dist/cjs commonjs
scripts.build:mjs: tsc --outDir dist/mjs -p tsconfig.mjs.json && node ../../../../scripts/package.js dist/mjs module
scripts.build:types: tsc -d --outDir dist/types -p tsconfig.mjs.json && rimraf dist/types/*.{js,map} dist/types/**/*.{js,map}
scripts.build: npm run build:rm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:mjs && npm run build:types
